title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 101.3 - Three-wheeled limited use motorcycles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 101.3 - Three-wheeled limited use motorcycles

State Regulations

Any three-wheeled limited use motorcycle may be sold, registered and operated with an enclosure for the operator if an unenclosed
model of the limited use motorcycle has been certified and approved for
registration pursuant to Part 102 of this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
101.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
